title: Automation.com - All Industrial Automation News and Products

items.title: TDK Announces Tronics Is Entering Machine and Asset Health Monitoring Market With Vibration Sensor Solutions
Machinery Orders Dip Against Stronger Year-Over-Year Gains
Predictive Precision: How Vibration Monitoring and Targeted Maintenance Extend Machinery Life
NEMA Welcomes Four Members, Elevating Industry Leadership
items.summary:
- NEMA welcomed three manufacturing members (Hyosung HICO, Milwaukee Tool, SWARCO McCain) and one associate member (IPS) to expand its 300+ member ecosystem, advancing *electrification* leadership.
- The new members will help accelerate grid reliability, safer buildings, and smarter mobility across industrial automation through extended collaboration.
- Leaders stress stronger **standards**, **innovation**, and a more resilient energy future powered by electricity.

items.title: Wauseon & Kawasaki at FABTECH 2025
items.summary:
- Wauseon Machine teams with **Kawasaki Robotics** to showcase *tube forming technology* at FABTECH 2025 in Chicago (Sept 8–11), booth B15001.
- The collaboration highlights seamless automation for high‑mix, variable‑volume runs within a collaborative *automation environment*, combining WM’s tube forming expertise with Kawasaki's robotics.
- Attendees can see live demos, connect with experts, and learn how *automation + tube forming* can drive business growth.

items.title: SEMI: Global semiconductor billings up 24% YoY in Q2-2025
items.summary:
- The WWSEMS report shows global semiconductor equipment billings rose *24% YoY* to **US$33.07B** in Q2 2025.
- Q2 2025 billings grew **3% QoQ**, helped by leading-edge logic, HBM-related DRAM, and stronger Asia shipments.
- SEMI notes strong H1 2025 with over **$65B** revenue and **$117B** in 2024, driven by AI investment and capacity expansion.

items.title: Drive Selection & Ordering with myNORD Online Tools
items.summary: - The *myNORD online portal* is a 24/7 e-commerce platform used by 26,500+ users, with flexible collaboration and a search that includes *input power*, *speed*, and *torque*.\n- It features a **Product Configurator** and plausibility checks, with saved quotes and account-specific pricing for easy submission.\n- A **Spare Parts Shop** and **Unit Identification** tool enable fast part finds, BOMs, pricing, and shipping options, with ERP integration on the horizon.

items.title: What to Expect at the 2025 ISA Automation Summit & Expo
items.author: Kara Phelps
items.summary: - The 2025 ISA Automation Summit & Expo runs Oct 5–7 at Disney’s Coronado Springs; the Expo features 74 vendors, *IT/OT convergence*, safety tech and the Student Simulation Showdown.\n- Keynotes blend strategy and technology, with talks like *To Infinity and Beyond* and *Confessions of a Dirty Hacker*, plus a fully sortable conference agenda.\n- *ICS4ICS* hands-on workshop offers practical defense; plan outcomes, schedule networking, and capture notes to maximize value; registration starts around **$835** for ISA members.

items.title: The Real ROI of Augmented Reality in Manufacturing: Beyond the Hype
items.author: Hélène Motycka
items.summary:
- AR delivers tangible ROI through *efficiency* gains (e.g., up to 60% productivity uplift) and faster onboarding, cutting training time by up to *50%*. 
- AR reduces *errors* and costs (lower defect rates, up to 30% inspection-time reductions, up to 80% rework cut) and improves safety and traceability. 
- A structured ROI approach (define objectives, select metrics, pick the right tech, calculate costs, measure outcomes, monitor and optimize) makes AR a strategic, long-term investment.

items.title: IFCO Opens Texas Facility for Fresh Grocery Innovation
items.summary:
- IFCO opened the *Dallas Service Center* in *Mesquite*, strengthening its North American *reusable packaging* network to serve growers and retailers.
- The 240,000-square-foot facility features *latest-generation wash and automation technology*, 15 loading docks, and will employ 100+ people to ensure safer, more sustainable operations.
- It will service 40+ million crates annually, enable 450+ million family interactions, and drive over 1 billion consumer touchpoints through the **SmartCycle** program.

items.title: IoT Waste Crisis: Wireless Power Escape
items.author: Charles Greene
items.summary:
- *IoT* growth to about 40B devices by 2030 is driving a massive *battery waste* and maintenance challenge.
- Millions of disposable batteries are discarded daily, harming *ecosystems* and increasing costs and logistics burdens.
- *RF-based wireless power* enables *battery-free* IoT deployments today, reducing waste and maintenance while boosting efficiency.

items.title: Siemens and Snowflake: IT/OT Convergence Across Edge & Cloud
items.summary:
- *Siemens Industrial Edge* and *Snowflake AI Data Cloud* connect OT and IT data, enabling AI‑driven insights and a unified data foundation.
- Plug‑and‑play Industrial Edge apps contextualize OT data and transfer it into IT, boosting machine performance and production.
- FFT, a Snowflake and Siemens partner, acts as an integrator to securely move data to the cloud and extend the solution across facilities.

items.title: The Replace, Repair or Retrain Decision
items.author: Brandon Glenn
items.summary:
- The article presents a **four-step framework** to decide when to replace, repair, or retrain, covering assessment, cost comparison, new-machine advantages, and realizing returns.
- Step 1 — Assess machinery and operator skill levels; evaluate repair frequency, production demands, and the role of ongoing *education and training* to boost performance.
- Step 4 — Realize new machine benefits, including lifecycle costs, financing options, and productivity gains from newer controls and automation.

items.title: In Memoriam: Hans D. Baumann, Ph.D, P.E.
items.author: Renee Bassett
items.summary:
- Dr. Hans D. Baumann, PE, died at 94 on March 25, 2025, in West Palm Beach, leaving a 70-year legacy in *valve design* and process control.
- He designed or directed over 30 valve lines (including CAMFLEX) and held more than 150 patents with 200+ papers, shaping standards and earning many awards.
- His work bridged academia and industry, pioneering fundamentals in *valve sizing*, *noise prediction*, and authoring references like *Fluid Mechanics of Control Valves* and *Control Valve Primer*.

items.title: Topical Roundup: August/September 2025
Using Foundation Fieldbus Linking Devices in Industry 4.0
items.author: Graham Proctor
items.summary:
- Foundation Fieldbus linking devices act as intelligent gateways, bridging legacy *Foundation Fieldbus* networks with PLC/DCS/SCADA for *Industry 4.0* architectures.
- They enable *seamless data exchange* between Fieldbus H1 and industrial Ethernet, provide *in-depth diagnostics*, and support *continuous health monitoring* to reduce downtime.
- With *redundancy*, secure and scalable **connectivity**, and *cloud/edge integration*, linking devices enhance reliability and enable advanced analytics.

items.title: Process Control Charts Ensure Manufacturing Excellence
items.author: Nikhil Makhija
items.summary: - *Control charts* are a core tool in *statistical process control (SPC)* used to maintain process stability and improve quality across industries.\n- They help distinguish common-cause variation from special causes, guiding **preventive actions** and supporting **Six Sigma** initiatives.\n- Implementing control charts requires data collection, parameter estimation, plotting over time, and interpreting patterns to reduce defects and waste.

items.title: The Future of Process Automation in Bioprocessing
Reducing Complexity in Data Center Cooling
items.author: Endress + Hauser Communications
items.summary:
- Hyperscale data centers are transitioning from *air cooling* to *liquid cooling* to meet dense HPC/AI workloads, with *liquid cooling* offering superior heat transfer and reducing hotspots.
- Traditional *invasive sensors* in thermowells introduce leakage risk, higher maintenance, wake-frequency design complexity, and energy penalties from flow disturbances.
- Endress+Hauser's *iTHERM SurfaceLine TM611* non-invasive sensor clamps to the pipe, reducing contamination risk, improving accuracy, and lowering energy consumption by minimizing flow disruption.

items.title: Lifecycle and Obsolescence Management: Extending Control System Lifespans
Safety: Understanding SIL, Cpt and PFDavg
Data Patterns India uses Siemens Xcelerator
items.summary:
- Data Patterns will adopt **Teamcenter** PLM and **Polarion ALM** from **Siemens Xcelerator** to standardize data, processes and people across manufacturing and testing, accelerating go-to-market times and improving product quality.
- The move enables *digital threads* that connect real-time data across engineering, design, development and manufacturing, automating compliance for faster workflows and helping meet DO-178C and DO-254 standards for safety-critical avionics.
- Siemens and Data Patterns expect this collaboration to boost growth in India’s defense and aerospace markets, reinforcing a culture of *first time right* with integrated, automated development and compliance solutions.

items.title: Digital Optical DO Probes Boost Operations
items.author: Kevin Stultz
items.summary: - *Conventional amperometric* DO sensors require frequent *calibration*, electrolyte maintenance, and flow-dependent operation, driving higher maintenance costs and downtime.\n- *Optical DO sensors* rely on luminescence quenching and **digital signals**, eliminating electrolyte refills, reducing drift, and enabling EMI-robust, multi-sensor networks.\n- Applications like wastewater aeration and steam generation benefit from longer *calibration intervals*, easier installation, and lower maintenance with digital optical DO technology.

items.title: ISA100 Wireless: Mature Tech Expands Applications
items.author: Jack Smith
items.summary:
- ISA100 Wireless is a *mature*, ANSI/IEC standard that supports *mesh*, *star*, and hybrid topologies for reliable field devices. 
- New features such as *BLE* and *OPC-UA* integration improve configuration and data access while preserving the core protocol. 
- The portfolio is expanding into safety-critical uses (gas detection, corrosion monitoring, valve control) and coexists with other wireless tech (WirelessHART, LoRa, BLE, 5G) in multi-protocol environments.

items.title: ABB and B&R Bring Joint Automation Technologies for Brewery and Beverage to Drinktec 2025
Energy Optimization for Parallel Variable Speed Pump Systems
items.author: R. Russell Rhinehart, L. J. Yebra
items.summary:
- The article outlines a method to determine the optimal number and *speed* of parallel pumps to meet *flow* and *head* demands, demonstrated on a parabolic trough solar-thermal plant and applicable to other processes. 
- It shows that using *variable speed drives* on multiple small pumps offers *energy savings* and higher reliability than a single large unit or throttled fixed‑speed pumps. 
- A *model‑based control* approach calibrates efficiencies and optimizes the number of pumps, pump speeds, and valve positions to minimize parasitic power losses while meeting targets, with results showing substantial reductions in power during daily irradiance cycles.

items.title: HANNOVER MESSE 2026: How Industry Masters Change
items.summary:
- *AI* driven automation, digitalization and energy solutions will be highlighted to boost productivity and competitiveness across industries.
- A **Defense Production Park** and a redesigned **three-area layout** connect software and hardware, improving guidance and accelerating scalable manufacturing.
- Brazil is the partner country, positioned as a strategic growth partner with opportunities in green energy, raw materials and industrial collaboration.

items.title: Trilogic Opens System Integration Facility
items.summary:
- Trilogic Systems opens a new Iowa facility to support high-mix, low-to-medium volume programs in aerospace, defense and robotics, with **VPX** systems and rugged server options.
- The site offers full *configuration control* and **lifecycle management**, plus export-controlled production via ITAR-certified partner networks.
- This expansion enables multi-vendor deployments and faster timelines from design to production while advancing open standards like *MOSA* and *SOSA*.

items.title: The Importance of Maintaining P&ID Accuracy
In Memorium: H. Reed Wiegle
Danfoss Opens Largest China Green Tech Facility
items.summary:
- Danfoss opened its largest global production facility in *Haiyan, China*, integrating three business segments and two ADCs to deliver advanced *energy-efficient technologies* for decarbonization. 
- The 126,000 sqm campus is LEAP 2030–aligned, featuring a three‑stage decarbonization (*Reduce, Reuse and Re-source*) and a 20‑year green power purchase with *CGN New Energy*. 
- The ceremony highlighted *China* as a key market for *green transition* and the Haiyan/Jiaxing partnership in Danfoss’ long‑term growth plan.

items.title: Faster Time to Market for dhp with EcoStruxure
items.summary:
- *dhp Technology AG*, with Schneider Electric and *Baffy AG*, has cut commissioning times by *50%* using **EcoStruxure Automation Expert**, gaining a market edge in retractable roofs projected to grow to *$1.3B* by 2033.
- **Open, software-defined automation** decouples software from hardware, enabling seamless integration across industrial systems and accelerating time to market for *dhp*.
- On-site technicians can manage automated solar roof systems independently, reducing complexity and delivering greater value to clients.

items.title: IOT Solutions Congress Brazil gathers 150 experts
items.summary: - The second edition of *IOT Solutions Congress Brazil (IOTSCB)* will gather over 6,000 visitors, 150 experts and 50 exhibitors in São Paulo from Sept 3–4, 2025.\n- The event, themed *“Connecting devices, connecting people, connecting worlds,”* will showcase cases that unite economic growth with social responsibility and explore topics like *humanistic IoT* and *digital transformation*.\n- Speakers include *Negar Feher*, *Houston R. Green*, *Letícia Maria Paz Lima*, and *Ali Dehghantanha*, while a startup area and test bench illustrate real-world applications.

items.title: GMG Upgrades to IFS Cloud for Next-Gen Automotive
items.summary:
- Gordon Murray Group is upgrading to *IFS Cloud* as part of a five‑year digital transformation to scale operations for the *T.33* supercar range.
- IFS Cloud’s **composable architecture** and embedded *Industrial AI* will deliver real‑time data visibility and smarter decision-making across GMG’s supply chain, finance, and manufacturing.
- The move aims to provide **scalability** and **agility**, driving evergreen innovation for GMG’s global, hand‑crafted performance cars.

items.title: UR Cobots at FABTECH 2025: Laser, Plasma & Finishing
items.summary:
- *UR cobots* at **FABTECH 2025** showcase new welding, finishing, and plasma cutting capabilities that push fabrication automation forward.
- *Laser welding* and *plasma cutting* with UR systems enable weld-ready parts and streamlined workflows across complex parts.
- Attendees can explore demos with partners like Hirebotics, THG Automation, and Vectis, plus sessions on *AI* and *automation* in metal fabrication.

items.title: JR Automation Plans $72.8M Global HQ
items.summary:
- JR Automation, a Hitachi Group company, will build a 286,000‑sq‑ft global headquarters in Zeeland, Michigan to drive *innovation* and *global collaboration*. 
- Groundbreaking is Sept 17, 2025 with completion by late Fall 2026; the 45‑acre campus houses ~350 employees across 76,000 sq ft of office and 210,000 sq ft of automation assembly, plus sustainability features. 
- The project advances carbon neutrality by 2030 and positions JR Automation as a hub for *digital twin*, *edge computing*, and *AI*-driven manufacturing under the One Hitachi strategy.

items.title: Siemens Training Year 2025: Digital Focus
items.summary:
- Siemens starts the 2025 training year with over 1,700 new trainees at 18 centers, focusing on *digital expertise*, responsible AI and a value compass to prepare Gen Z for the future.
- The program uses *AI‑supported didactics*, VR/AR and immersive methods to teach AI, data analytics, IoT, cybersecurity and the circular economy, promoting lifelong, self-determined learning.
- It strengthens social values with Xplore and digital training agreements via e-signature, plus *SIEYA@School* for STEM career orientation, backed by about €442 million invested in 2024.

items.title: Sappi North America, Valmet Celebrate Successful Start-Up of Rebuilt Paper Machine 2
items.summary: - In May 2025, Sappi North America and *Valmet* celebrated the successful start-up of rebuilt *PM2* at the Somerset facility in Skowhegan, Maine, marking a milestone in Sappi's transition to *packaging grades*.\n- The early production of commercial-grade *SBS board* highlights the strength of the collaboration and progress achieved through close partnership during commissioning.\n- *Valmet*’s technical knowledge and teamwork helped move the project forward, signifying a sustainable conversion and continued ramp-up of PM2.

items.title: Attendees Enjoy OT Cybersecurity Summit in Brussels
items.author: Renee Bassett
items.summary: - The *ISA* hosted its third-annual OT Cybersecurity Summit in Brussels (June 18–21, 2025), a leading event for industrial cybersecurity and the *ISA/IEC 62443* standards.\n- Attendees praised the mix of global cybersecurity pros and newcomers; the summit featured two tracks, 40 speakers across 35 sessions, with 250 attendees and 21 sponsors.\n- Highlights included the *ISAGCA* and *ISASecure* sponsorship, white papers on IT-OT intersections, the *IACS Security Assurance* program, *ICS4ICS* training, and the 2026 Prague summit.

items.title: ISA Recognizes 2025 Celebrating Excellence Awardees
items.author: Renee Bassett
items.summary:
- ISA announced the 2025 Celebrating Excellence award recipients to honor ISA members, partners and automation professionals at the **ISA Honors and Awards Gala** during the **Automation Summit and Expo** in Lake Buena Vista, Oct 5–7, 2025.
- Carlos Mandolesi received the **Enduring Society Service** award for lifelong leadership and initiatives like International Automation Professionals Day and the **SMIIoT** division.
- Additional honorees include leaders in **education**, **mentoring**, **standards** and **technical achievement**, plus regional section recognitions and ISA volunteers.

items.title: In Memorium: Ronald L. Krutz, Ph.D., PE
From the Editor: Process Control Books Help You Identify Real Experts
Single Pair Ethernet Pavilion to Join Inaugural Opening of SPS Atlanta 2025
Yokogawa Launches Green Sustainability Principles
items.summary:
*Yokogawa has established the Trusted Green guiding principles, covering the entire product lifecycle.*

- The principles focus on providing **reliable products**, reducing **environmental impact**, and building a **circular ecosystem**.

- The initiative emphasizes collaboration with customers and stakeholders to promote sustainability and resource recycling, aligning with Yokogawa's long-term vision for 2050 and societal goals.

items.title: Otto Mation Comic Caption Contest: September 2025
items.summary:
*Otto is heading to space, prompting readers to create captions for the comic.*
- Submissions can be prize-winning and involve a fun way to engage with automation professionals.
- The article introduces Otto Mation, a comic series about a young automation expert with the rare C.A.P. skill, highlighting his origins and work in the field.

items.title: ABB to Implement Gearless Mill Drive Program in Chile
items.summary:
- *ABB and Codelco* announced a long-term service agreement to optimize maintenance of *gearless mill drive (GMD)* systems at Chilean copper mines.
- The program includes *remote diagnostics*, *lifecycle management*, and support for *sustainability and efficiency* goals across two major mines.
- *GMDs* are crucial for efficient ore processing and reducing emissions, supporting the *growing copper demand* and industry sustainability.

**Scores:** {"scale": 8, "impact": 7, "novelty": 6, "longTermSignificance": 8}
**Keywords:** [ABB, Codelco, GMD, Copper Mining, Sustainability, Maintenance, Digitalization]

items.title: Honeywell to Optimize AMIGO LNG Facility in Mexico
items.summary:
*Honeywell will implement advanced pretreatment and automation technology at the new AMIGO LNG export terminal in Mexico.*
- *The modular pretreatment system ensures efficient removal of impurities, enabling faster installation and reliable operation.*
- *Integrated control and safety systems will enhance operational control, safety, and project delivery, supporting Mexico's regional energy strategy.*

items.title: Manufacturing Sector Growth Stagnant in Q2 2025
items.summary:
- *Global manufacturing growth remains stagnant* in Q2 2025, affected by *US trade policies* and *uncertainty*. 
- *Regions like Europe* face stagnation, while *growth is concentrated* in China, the US, and select APAC economies. 
- *US tariffs* and *destocking* have slowed *machinery production*, though *growth is expected* to reach about 2% in 2025.

items.title: Brushed DC Motors Lead by Dunkermotoren
items.summary:
- *Brushed DC motors* are valued for their **simplicity, reliability**, and **cost-effectiveness**, powering diverse industries.
- Despite the growth of **brushless** motors, brushed motors like Dunkermotoren's GR Series excel in *high torque*, *wide voltage range*, and *ruggedness*.
- Applications span **medical, automation, transportation, and agriculture**, with a focus on *performance, modularity*, and *long lifespan*.

*Keywords:* brushed motors, Dunkermotoren, industrial automation, reliability, torque, modularity

items.title: Four Maintenance Strategies to Extend Warehouse Equipment Life
items.summary:
*Effective maintenance strategies are crucial for prolonging *warehouse equipment* lifespan, especially in high-throughput environments.*
- Implementing **preventive maintenance** helps catch issues early, reducing costly Downtime.
- Utilizing **predictive maintenance** with IoT and data analytics anticipates failures before they happen, saving costs.
- Keeping **detailed records** and training on-site teams enhances operational efficiency and safety.
**Prioritizing maintenance can boost operational flow, safety, and revenue.**
